item.description:
Hey All,

 

Last year's Shoot & Ski (though not on the same day) was great fun! And, dinner at Gauchos Churrascaria Brazilian Steak House was almost as good as the shooting and skiing!

 

As we did last year, the target shooting will take place at the Manchester Firing Line Range in Manchester, NH. No need to have or bring your own equipment -- there are tons of guns to rent at the range and they'll even sell you the ammo. Oh, and yes, they have fully automatic firearms to rent too!!

 

We'll be meeting at, um, "high noon"  at the Manchester Firing Line Range's new state of the art facility at 2540 Brown Avenue in Manchester, NH. Expect to wait in line for up to an hour... Saturdays at the range are busy... but it will be ok to corral ourselves and chat while we wait in anticipation of the shooting! (Did anyone get my two puns referring to two classic gun movies!?!)

 

If you have questions or concerns, please email your friendly (albeit armed) co-organizers Mark or Gavin. :-)

 

Notwithstanding the graphic, we will not be shooting while skiing :)

 

But wait there's more! ...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Mark or Gavin. Our mugs should be familiar by now! :-)

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: Annual NH Shoot, Dine and Ski Weekend: Sat. Afternoon Target Shooting
